text:
"Space Gundam V" (스페이스 간담 V) or "Space Gandam V" is a 1983 South Korean animated science fiction action mecha film directed by Kim-Cheong-Gi. produced by Seoul Donghwa Productions.
Plot.
in middle of South Korean mountains found a giant robot called "Space Gundam V" by piloting an alien named Agent Dicke against Agent Hades wraths over earth attacked brought an a giant rat, giant humanoid bat, giant spider. led by an ruler of outer space named Uranus an man ruler of the stars. they taken the body of Tan-i inside Dicke's form.
